page.title: 06FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: Every Saturday morning the two children get up at about 9:45 to watch television or play games on their computer. Later the parents get up to make breakfast of bacon, eggs and tea. In the afternoon the children go out with their dad to play golf or tennis. When they arrive back they get their dinner and later usually sit down to watch T.V. Sometimes the boys go to their friends' house to play pool or football. On Sundays the whole family must go to Mass from 11:00 to 11:50.After lunch they go out to play some sort of sport like golf, tennis or table tennis. If the weather is bad they would stay inside and probably watch T.V. During the summer in good weather they go down to the beach to swim or sunbathe.
